name: Threshold Intervals
description: Cruise intervals at lactate threshold pace with short recovery.
purpose: Extend time at threshold without accumulating excessive fatigue.

cruise.structure: 3-4 x 1 mile at threshold with 1 min jog

tempo_intervals.structure: 2-3 x 2 miles at threshold with 2 min jog

notes: Threshold is the pace you could hold for about an hour in a race. Comfortably uncomfortable.
